name: Dhania Waale Aloo Matar - Potatoes and Peas stir fry with crisp Cilantro. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
description: Dhania Waale Aloo Matar. Potatoes and peas spiced with Indian spices and cilantro. Easy spiced dry potato and peas Subzi. Vegan Soy-free Gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon chili powder or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and heat on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add oil and heat on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cilantro and mix and cook for 2 minutes until lightly crisp on the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cilantro and mix and cook for 2 minutes until lightly crisp on the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Add potatoes and cook for 6-7 minutes, uncovered. Stir once in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Add potatoes and cook for 6-7 minutes, uncovered. Stir once in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Add coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, garlic and 1/2 tsp garam masala if using, and mix well. Cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add coriander powder, turmeric, chili powder, garlic and 1/2 tsp garam masala if using, and mix well. Cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add peas and salt, mix cover and cook on low-medium heat, until potatoes are done. 8-10 minutes. Stir once in between. Add a splash of water if the potatoes stick too much and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add peas and salt, mix cover and cook on low-medium heat, until potatoes are done. 8-10 minutes. Stir once in between. Add a splash of water if the potatoes stick too much and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and spice. Mix well. Serve hot garnished with cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and spice. Mix well. Serve hot garnished with cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve as a side with Dal, top a bowl of quinoa (add Mint chutney), or use as stuffing for sandwiches, wraps or samosas.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve as a side with Dal, top a bowl of quinoa (add Mint chutney), or use as stuffing for sandwiches, wraps or samosas.
